        public static <T extends Component<T>> ComponentContext<T> fromJson(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject context)
        Creates a component context from JSON.
        Parameters:
        context - A JSON representation of the component context.
        Returns:
        A component context instance.
        Throws:
        MalformedContextException - If the context is malformed.
